column4: Google rebrands cloud business  adds more artificial intelligence
column5: Alphabet Inc's Google said on Thursday it renamed its business-to-business cloud computing brand and enhanced some enterprise applications using artificial intelligence  the company's latest gambit to better compete with Amazon.com and Microsoft Corp. in the lucrative cloud business.

column4: Salesforce urges EU to probe Microsoft  Linkedin antitrust issues
column5: BRUSSELS  Sept 29 U.S. software company Salesforce called on EU regulators on Thursday to investigate antitrust issues related to Microsoft's $26 billion bid for social network LinkedIn.

column4: Google rebrands cloud business  adds more artificial intelligence
column5: By Julia Love     Sept 29 Alphabet Inc's Google said on Thursday it renamed its business-to-business cloud computing brand and enhanced some enterprise applications using artificial intelligence  the company's latest gambit to better compete with Amazon.com and Microsoft Corp. in the lucrative cloud business. column4: Microsoft sharpens AI focus with new research group
column5: Microsoft Corp said on Thursday it created a new artificial intelligence unit  as the company pushes deeper into the fast-growing field.

column5: Sept 29 Microsoft Corp said on Thursday it created a new artificial intelligence unit  as the company pushes deeper into the fast-growing field.

column5: * New Microsoft AI and research group will be led by Harry Shum

column4: Tesla's Musk to employees: no more discounts on new cars
column5: DETROIT  Sept 29 Electric carmaker Tesla Motors Inc Chief Executive Elon Musk told employees in an email to follow company policy of not offering discounts on new cars  answering some investors' recent concerns about the practice.

column4: NXP Semiconductors explores sale to Qualcomm: sources
column5: NXP Semiconductors NV  is exploring selling itself to Qualcomm Inc  in a deal that could be valued at more than $30 billion  two sources familiar with the matter said on Thursday.

column4: UPDATE 6-NXP Semiconductors explores sale to Qualcomm-sources
column5: Sept 29 NXP Semiconductors NV is exploring selling itself to Qualcomm Inc in a deal that could be valued at more than $30 billion  two sources familiar with the matter said on Thursday.

column4: Qualcomm in talks to buy NXP Semiconductors - CNBC  citing DJ
column5: Sept 29 Chipmaker Qualcomm Inc is in talks to buy NXP Semiconductors NV in a deal that could value NXP at more than $30 billion  CNBC reported  citing Dow Jones.
